agents

Class OrdinaryPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • agents.BasicAgent
        • agents.Peer
          • agents.OrdinaryPeer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, P2PVocabulary

    public class OrdinaryPeer
extends Peer
    Ordinary Peers have a limited set of functionality compared with Super Peers, but are more common in the network. They have less bandwidth than Super Peers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • needsToSendFileList

        public boolean needsToSendFileList()
        Returns:
        True if the peer has only just connected, or has a new shared file. False otherwise.
